title: no capsule when i reached lvl40
body: i didn't get a capsule when i reached lvl40 but i did get e capsule when i reached lvl41 can you guys look in to this pleas

replies.body: I gotchu covered fam. That level 40 capsule isn't a good one to miss either! Double check your loot now and lemme know how it turns out!
thank you for the help it means allot to me that is why i love l League of Legends i got the capsule i'm very happy
